name: The Colonel
description: You've got natural leadership abilities, and years of experience in the field. People tend to respect your authority, and your tactical instincts are very well honed. You can handle yourself in a fight, but you use your wits to avoid violence when possible.

moves.name: Cover fire
moves.description: When you protect someone, you don't take any harm on a success. On 10+, you deal 1 harm to the enemy

moves.name: Pull rank
moves.description: Others respect your authority, and are more likely to do what you say (+1 manipulate someone)

moves.name: Combat tactics
moves.description: Take 1 less harm than usual when you kick some ass

moves.name: Weapons training
moves.description: You can carry one more serious weapon than normal

moves.name: Situational awareness
moves.description: You're training has honed your senses to potential danger (+1 read a bad situation)

moves.name: Natural leader
moves.description: Your leadership ability helps your team perform up to their potential (+1 help out)

items.name: Night vision goggles
tags: +1 investigate, read a bad situation in the dark

items.name: Binoculars
tags: +1 investigate, read a bad situation at a distance

items.name: Plastic explosives
tags: plant, then detonate from a safe distance

histories: This explorer trained under you a long time ago
This explorer questions your leadership whenever hard choices need to be made
You made a decision that led to the death of someone this explorer cared for
This explorer has a tendency to not follow your orders
This explorer considers you a mentor and looks up to you
This explorer thinks you're unqualified for your job
This explorer is inexperienced with violence, and needs to be babysat during combat
